features: These bangles boast a classic, flexible design, each segment interconnected for comfortable wear. The intricate setting of the CZ stones is reminiscent of traditional nakshi work, adding a touch of heritage to a modern piece. The floral clusters enhance their visual appeal.

description: These bangles seamlessly blend traditional South Indian aesthetics with modern design sensibilities. The use of 22K gold ensures lasting value, while the Hyderabadi polish provides exceptional brilliance. Comfortable, durable, and eye-catching, these Swarna Kanganalu are a worthy investment for generations to come.
